Description:
Requirements/Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Mass Communications or other advertising subjects preferred.
Excellent planning and project management skills, with strong attention to detail.
Excellent digital marketing skills in planning, executing and reporting on campaigns.
Experience in working in a highly regulated environment.
Flexible and agile to change, with a resilient personality and that is able to stay calm under pressure.
Strong interpersonal skills and significant experience in systematic stakeholder management, cross-regional teams, and other key stakeholders.
Excellent oral and written communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
Strong team player with ability to earn trust, collaborate and influence a wide range of stakeholders, to drive toward business goals and outcomes independently and proactively.
Strong knowledge and abilities to use multiple platforms and channels (including digital) for a range of audiences.
Background and experience in PR/media relations agencies with good account management and understanding of corporate, in-house marketing campaigns.
Well versed in digitally running campaigns and PR works - website/SEO/SEM/social media.Job Details
